name: Yu Wu 0011
content: Yu Wu's Homepage Yu Wu Professor Wuhan University Biography I am Yu Wu (武宇), a Full Professor at School of Computer Science, Wuhan University. Before that I was a postdoc at Visual AI Lab, Princeton University from 2021 to 2022. I received my Ph.D. at the ReLER Lab, University of Technology Sydney, advised by Prof.Yi Yang. I received the B.Eng degree in Mechanical Engineering from Shanghai Jiao Tong University. Here are my Google Scholar and CV. Looking for highly-motivated Postdoc/Ph.D. students for 2023! Feel free to drop me an email with your CV. 中文网站 News 2023.02: Served as the NeurIPS 2023 Area Chair. 2022.06: Served as the CVPR 2023 Workshop Chair and Area Chair. 2021.09: We are organizing the Video Scene Parsing in the Wild workshop at ICCV 21. 2021.06: Ranked 1st in Large-scale Video Object Segmentation Challenge @CVPR21. 2021.06: I was selected for CVPR 2021 Doctoral Consortium. 2020.10: I was awarded the Google PhD Fellowship. 2020.06: We won the 1st place in the EPIC-Kitchens Action Recognition Challenge @ CVPR20 for the second year. Our report can be find here. 2019.06: We ranked 1st in the EPIC-Kitchens Action Recognition Challenge @ CVPR19.
